subject: Doping (Sports)
Bicycles and Bicycling
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: The hearing, related to the 2010 Tour de France, was scheduled for next week, but will probably now occur in November, the Court of Arbitration for Sport said.
snippet: The hearing, related to the 2010 Tour de France, was scheduled for next week, but will probably now occur in November, the Court of Arbitration for Sport said.
